Package datastorage

Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
datastorage.DAOimp<User>
datastorage.UserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<User>
public class UserDAO extends DAOimp<User>
DAO Class for the User
Creates PreparedStatements for all DAO Operations for the User
Implements the DAOimp interface
